vuengine/plugins/cameras/PlatformerCamer.title: Platformer Camera
vuengine/plugins/cameras/PlatformerCamer.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/cameras/PlatformerCamer.description: A common platformer camera that follows an entity

vuengine/plugins/entities/LowPowerEntity.title: Low Power Entity
vuengine/plugins/entities/LowPowerEntity.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/entities/LowPowerEntity.description: Entity based indicator that flashes when the system power is low

vuengine/plugins/entities/ReflectiveEnti.title: Reflective Entity
vuengine/plugins/entities/ReflectiveEnti.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/entities/ReflectiveEnti.description: An Entity that can mirror other parts of the virtual screen

vuengine/plugins/fonts/AstonishFont.title: Astonish Font
vuengine/plugins/fonts/AstonishFont.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/fonts/AstonishFont.description: A beautiful 8x16 pixel font for medium size text

vuengine/plugins/fonts/IndustrialFont.title: Industrial Font
vuengine/plugins/fonts/IndustrialFont.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/fonts/IndustrialFont.description: A bold, angular 8x8 pixel font that resembles industrial lettering.

vuengine/plugins/fonts/VirtualBoyFont.title: VirtualBoy Font
vuengine/plugins/fonts/VirtualBoyFont.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/fonts/VirtualBoyFont.description: Large font based on the "Virtual Boy" writing from the official IPD adjustment screen

vuengine/plugins/graphics/GuiBgmapAnimat.title: GuiBgmapAnimatedSprite
vuengine/plugins/graphics/GuiBgmapAnimat.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/graphics/GuiBgmapAnimat.description: An animated BGMap sprite that is not affected by the camera frustum. Optimal for GUIs.

vuengine/plugins/other/AutomaticPause.title: Automatic Pause
vuengine/plugins/other/AutomaticPause.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/other/AutomaticPause.description: Automatically pauses the game after a definable amount of time

vuengine/plugins/other/LowPowerIndicator.title: Low Power Indicator
vuengine/plugins/other/LowPowerIndicator.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/other/LowPowerIndicator.description: Printing layer based indicator that flashes when the system power is low

vuengine/plugins/other/SaveDataManager.title: Save Data Manager
vuengine/plugins/other/SaveDataManager.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/other/SaveDataManager.description: Manages persistence of user data in SRAM

vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/DwarfPla.title: Dwarf Planet
vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/DwarfPla.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/DwarfPla.description: "Bends down" the left and right edges of the screen to make the world look like a very small planet

vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Lantern.title: Lantern
vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Lantern.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Lantern.description: Adds a lantern like effect to any SpatialObject, where everything outside of a certain radius around the SpatialObject is rendered black

vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Rhombus.title: Rhombus
vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Rhombus.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Rhombus.description: Draws a rhombus emitted from any SpatialObject

vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Test.title: Test
vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Test.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Test.description: Simple test effect that lights up a rectangular area around any SpatialObject

vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Tilt.title: Tilt
vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Tilt.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Tilt.description: "Tilts" the game image by a few percent by gradually shifting columns

vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Wobble.title: Wobble
vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Wobble.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/postProcessing/Wobble.description: Applies a full screen wobble distortion that is reminiscent of water waves

vuengine/plugins/states/SplashScreens.title: Splash Screens
vuengine/plugins/states/SplashScreens.author: VUEngine
vuengine/plugins/states/SplashScreens.description: A collection of default splash screens
